data.actual_result: Whole of Discord is shifted up. Causing top bar to go into status bar and White bar at bottom.
data.short_description: [No on screen buttons] Rotating Device while in the join DM Call (Group/1-1) with the 3 dot menu open causes everything to shift upwards
data.steps_to_repro: - Get someone to call you - Open the "Connect to voice" menu - Open 3 dot menu in top right - Rotate Device
